reviews.review_msg: This professor is awesome! She is extremely helpful and really wants her students to be successful. I had an awesome experience with her. I took a political science 210 course with her and she really knew her stuff. I learned a great deal. She has a young & cool way of teaching. I'd take her again if I could!

I took American Political Science with Moens and I have to say that for a right-wing prof, Moens was pretty tolerant with other peoples opinions. He encouraged questions and discussion. Attending class is a must as he gives more info than on pp slides. Midterm and final were very hard, also keep up on current events, it will be your saving grace
Great prof! very easy to talk to and ask questions. She appreciates discussion. If you have any issues with writing your essay, go speak to her; she's very helpful!
